#summary How to setup X-server on Windows machines

= How to setup X-server on Windows machines =

== Download Xming and Putty ==

Download Xming and Putty from the following links.

  * Xming: [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/xming/Xming-6-9-0-31-setup.exe?use_mirror=superb-east download]
  * Putty: [http://the.earth.li/~sgtatham/putty/latest/x86/putty.exe download]

== Install Xming ==

Click 'Xming-6-9-0-31-setup.exe' and install Xming by using the default settings.
